thread.title: As if standing on the board wasn't hard enough! The incredible acrobatic tandem surf duo who can make gymnastic shapes while riding the waves
thread.title_full: As if standing on the board wasn't hard enough! The incredible acrobatic tandem surf duo who can make gymnastic shapes while riding the waves | Daily Mail Online

author: Naomi Leach For Mailonline
title: As if standing on the board wasn't hard enough! The incredible acrobatic tandem surf duo who can make gymnastic shapes while riding the waves
text:
6 shares 6
View
comments
It takes a lot of skill to surf a wave normally on a surfboard, but to hold different shapes in the air on the shoulders of a partner is even more challenging.
That is what talented pair Lauren Oiye and Chuck Inman were caught doing while taking part in the Tandem Surfing competitions in Waikiki, Hawaii.
Unlike the average surfing competition, Lauren and Chuck combine the balance needed to even stand up on a surfboard, with the strength required to hold up various gymnastic poses.
Scroll down for video
Talented pair Lauren Oiye and Chuck Inman took part in the Tandem Surfing competitions in Waikiki, Hawaii
Unlike the average surfing competition, Lauren and Chuck combine the balance needed to even stand up on a surfboard, with the strength needed to hold up various gymnastic poses
After winning the 2012 ITSA World Tandem Tour Title and 2012 ISA World Championship Title, they started pushing the limits of the sport, and themselves
A series of dash-cam images from the competition have captured the intricate manoeuvres Lauren has to make to get into the shapes above Chuck at breathtaking angles
The two friends have a remarkable bond, with the video showing their impeccable timing to synchronise with each other to get into the poses.
A series of dash-cam images from the competition have captured the intricate manoeuvres Lauren has to make to get into the shapes above Chuck at breathtaking angles.

Gravity defying bravery and skill is demonstrated by the acrobatic duo, Lauren and Chuck
Synchronicity: Chuck's upper body strength is demonstrated as he raises Lauren high in the air while calmly carving the waves.
Commenting on their expertly timed acrobatic performance, the impressive duo said: 'We attempted to create lifts that have never been done before. This year we are so excited that many of those lifts we have created will be scored on the new lift chart.
'It's just so much fun. It definitely takes a lot of trust on both of us of each other. It's like nothing we could explain.
'Every wave is different and the way we surf it and the lifts we put up are always different. It's such a thrill!' Chuck and Lauren explained.
'We attempted to create lifts that have never been done before,' said Lauren and Chuck
'Every wave is different and the way we surf it and the lifts we put up are always different,' Chuck and Lauren explained.
Lauren has to quickly shift into a number of shapes at breathtaking angles above Chuck's head
Bond of trust: The close friends have been tandem surfing together for years and challenge each other to try new shapes
